name: pokemon-showdown-api
description: A low-level library for connecting to and interacting with the Pokemon Showdown server

scripts.prepublish: find . | grep -v './node_modules\|./.git' | grep .coffee$ | xargs coffee -c && sed -i '1i #!/usr/bin/env node' src/repl.js && chmod +x src/repl.js
scripts.install-dev: npm pack && export PACKED=$(npm ls --depth=0 | head -n 1 | cut -d ' ' -f 1 | tr @ -).tgz && npm install $PACKED && npm install -g $PACKED && npm run postpublish && rm $PACKED
scripts.uninstall-dev: npm uninstall pokemon-showdown-api && npm uninstall -g pokemon-showdown-api
